platforms.name: Gemini 3 Pro
platforms.description: Gemini 3 Pro is Google's latest flagship AI model, launched in 2025 with groundbreaking multimodal capabilities. It achieves a 76.2% score on SWE-bench Verified (surpassing Claude Sonnet 4.5's 70%), features a 1M token context window with 64K output, and uniquely offers full native video processing alongside text and images. Its key differentiator is best-in-class reasoning combined with true multimodal understanding including video, making it ideal for complex analysis and agentic workflows.
keyFeatures: 76.2% SWE-bench Verified score (highest available)
1M token context window with 64K output
Native video processing (unique among all models)

platforms.name: Google PaLM 2
platforms.description: Google PaLM 2 is a state-of-the-art large language model (LLM) developed by Google, powering its Bard chatbot and foundational AI services. It excels in advanced reasoning, multilingual understanding across 100+ languages, and code generation, making it a versatile tool for complex NLP tasks. Its unique architecture, trained on a diverse mix of scientific papers, web pages, and source code, is optimized for efficiency and performance across various model sizes (Gecko, Otter, Bison, Unicorn).
keyFeatures: Multilingual proficiency in over 100 languages with nuanced understanding of idioms and grammar
Advanced logical reasoning and mathematical problem-solving capabilities
Proficient code generation and debugging in over 20 programming languages (e.g., Python, JavaScript, Prolog)

platforms.name: Mistral AI
platforms.description: Mistral AI is a European company at the forefront of developing open and efficient large language models (LLMs). It provides a suite of powerful models, ranging from small, cost-effective options to massive frontier models, known for their strong multilingual capabilities, robust reasoning, and built-in safety features. Its unique value proposition lies in its commitment to open-source releases, developer-friendly APIs, and a pragmatic approach that balances high performance with commercial viability.
keyFeatures: Mistral Large flagship model with strong reasoning & multilingual (EN, FR, ES, DE, IT) capabilities
Mixtral 8x7B & 8x22B sparse mixture-of-experts (MoE) models for efficient inference
Open-source model releases (e.g., Mistral 7B, Codestral code model) under permissive Apache 2.0 license

platforms.name: Helicone
platforms.description: Helicone is an open-source observability platform specifically designed for applications built on Large Language Models (LLMs). It provides developers and businesses with comprehensive monitoring, analytics, and optimization tools to track API requests, manage costs, analyze performance, and implement safeguards like rate limiting. Its unique value lies in being a lightweight, developer-first platform that offers deep visibility into LLM usage across multiple providers (like OpenAI, Anthropic) without requiring extensive code changes.
keyFeatures: Unified request logging and tracing across multiple LLM providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.)
Granular cost tracking and visualization per user, project, model, or API key
Latency and performance analytics with caching insights to reduce costs

platforms.name: Grok-3
platforms.description: Grok-3 is a large language model developed by Elon Musk's xAI, designed as a conversational AI assistant with real-time knowledge integration from the X platform. Its key capabilities include providing up-to-date information, answering complex questions with a distinctive witty and rebellious personality, and offering unfiltered perspectives. It uniquely targets users seeking an alternative to more cautious AI models, positioning itself as a tool for those who value current events awareness, humor, and direct integration with social media discourse.
keyFeatures: Real-time knowledge retrieval via integration with the X (formerly Twitter) platform
Witty, sarcastic, and rebellious conversational tone as a defining personality trait
Direct access within the X app for Premium+ subscribers

platforms.name: Kimi Chat
platforms.description: Kimi Chat is a Chinese AI assistant developed by Moonshot AI, specializing in processing and analyzing extremely long documents and complex data. Its key capability is an exceptionally long context window of up to 2 million tokens, allowing it to handle entire books, lengthy research papers, and large datasets in a single session. It uniquely targets users needing deep document comprehension and is distinguished by its native strength in Chinese language processing and integration with Chinese web services.
keyFeatures: 2 million token context window (one of the longest available)
Upload and analyze documents (PDF, Word, Excel, PPT, TXT, images)
Integrated web search with real-time information retrieval

platforms.name: Kimi AI
platforms.description: Kimi AI is a Chinese-developed intelligent assistant and large language model platform specializing in processing ultra-long text contexts of up to 2 million tokens. Its core capabilities include deep document analysis, complex reasoning, and web-augmented research, making it particularly powerful for academic, legal, and technical domains. It stands out for its industry-leading context length, robust Chinese language support, and strong integration with real-time web search for up-to-date information retrieval.
keyFeatures: Up to 2 million token context window for processing entire books or large document sets
Multi-format file upload support (PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, TXT, images)
Real-time web search integration with source citation

platforms.name: Bard (Gemini)
platforms.description: Bard, now known as Gemini, is Google's flagship conversational AI chatbot and assistant, powered by its multimodal Gemini family of models. It is designed to understand, generate, and combine text, code, images, and audio, deeply integrated with Google's ecosystem for real-time web search, productivity tools, and developer services. Its key differentiator is its native, seamless access to Google's vast suite of applications and real-time information, positioning it as a versatile assistant for both general and professional tasks.
keyFeatures: Multimodal input processing (text, images, audio, documents)
Real-time information retrieval via Google Search integration
Code generation, explanation, and debugging in 20+ programming languages

platforms.name: Axiom AI
platforms.description: Axiom AI is a specialized reasoning engine designed to tackle complex, multi-step problems requiring logical deduction and structured thought. It excels in domains like advanced mathematics, scientific research, and strategic planning by employing a modified transformer architecture optimized for chain-of-thought reasoning. Its unique value lies in its focus on verifiable, step-by-step logical processes over general conversational ability, making it a tool for deep analytical work.
keyFeatures: Deterministic chain-of-thought reasoning with step-by-step output
Formal verification for mathematical proofs and logical statements
Controllable reasoning depth and search breadth for complex problems

platforms.description: Inflection AI's third-generation large language model, announced as one of the most compute-efficient large models, achieving top-tier performance with improved factual accuracy and safety.
